page.shortlink: api extension namespace curl class getinfo method
page.description: Gets information concerning the last transfer.

section.title: Supported CURL Info
section.description: The following CURL info names are supported. For more information about these , see the [CURL documentation].

item.name: EFFECTIVE_URL
item.description: Last used URL.

item.name: RESPONSE_CODE
item.description: Last received response code.

item.name: TOTAL_TIME
item.description: Total time of previous transfer.

item.name: NAMELOOKUP_TIME
item.description: Time from start until name resolving completed.

item.name: CONNECT_TIME
item.description: Time from start until remote host or proxy completed.

item.name: PRETRANSFER_TIME
item.description:
The time it took from the start until the file transfer is just about to begin. This includes all pre-transfer commands and negotiations that are specific to the particular protocol(s) involved.
STARTTRANSFER

item.name: HEADER_SIZE
item.description: Number of bytes of all headers received.

item.name: REQUEST_SIZE
item.description: Number of bytes sent in the issued HTTP requests.

item.name: SSL_VERIFYRESULT
item.description: Certificate verification result.

item.name: FILETIME
item.description: Remote time of the retrieved document.

item.name: STARTTRANSFER_TIME
item.description: The time it took from the start until the first byte is received by libcurl.

item.name: CONTENT_TYPE
item.description: Content type from the Content-Type header.

item.name: REDIRECT_TIME
item.description: The time it took for all redirection steps include name lookup, connect, pretransfer and transfer before final transaction was started. So, this is zero if no redirection took place.

item.name: REDIRECT_COUNT
item.description: Total number of redirects that were followed.

item.name: HTTP_CONNECTCODE
item.description: Last proxy CONNECT response code.

item.name: HTTPAUTH_AVAIL
item.description: Available HTTP authentication methods.

item.name: PROXYAUTH_AVAIL
item.description: Available HTTP proxy authentication methods.

item.name: OS_ERRNO
item.description: The errno from the last failure to connect.

item.name: NUM_CONNECTS
item.description: Number of new successful connections used for previous transfer.

item.name: SSL_ENGINES
item.description: A list of OpenSSL crypto engines.

item.name: COOKIELIST
item.description: List of all known cookies.
item.note: This will always be empty unless the .SetOpt() method was called before the .Exec() call with "COOKIEFILE" option set to "".

item.name: FTP_ENTRY_PATH
item.description: The entry path after logging in to an FTP server.

item.name: REDIRECT_URL
item.description: URL a redirect would take you to, had you enabled redirects.

item.name: PRIMARY_IP
item.description: IP address of the last connection.

item.name: APPCONNECT_TIME
item.description: The time it took from the start until the SSL connect/handshake with the remote host was completed.

item.name: CONDITION_UNMET
item.description: Whether or not a time conditional was met.

item.name: RTSP_SESSION_ID
item.description: RTSP session ID.

item.name: RTSP_CLIENT_CSEQ
item.description: RTSP CSeq that will next be used.

item.name: RTSP_SERVER_CSEQ
item.description: RTSP CSeq that will next be expected.

item.name: RTSP_CSEQ_RECV
item.description: RTSP CSeq last received.

item.name: PRIMARY_PORT
item.description: Port of the last connection.

item.name: LOCAL_IP
item.description: Local-end IP address of last connection.

item.name: LOCAL_PORT
item.description: Local-end port of last connection.
